### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) and connected pipes

### Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5) and connected pipes

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0) and connected pipes

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) and connected pipes

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0) and connected pipes

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected
- Check that the connection points of the entities are not occupied by other entities
- Verify that the entities are compatible for connection

### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure that the pipe is not being placed in a location that overlaps with water or other entities
- Try placing the pipe at a different location

### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure that the item being inserted exists and is valid
- Check that the entity being inserted into is capable of holding the item

### Errors when using prototypes
- Ensure that the prototype being used exists and is valid
- Check that the prototype is being used correctly and in the right context

### Errors when working with fluids
- Ensure that the fluid being used exists and is valid
- Check that the entities being used with the fluid are compatible and correctly connected

### Errors when working with electricity
- Ensure that the electricity network is correctly set up and connected
- Check that the entities being used with electricity are compatible and correctly connected
